prodNameC: 邦迪斯人類抗雙股螺旋去氧核醣核酸免疫分析套組
prodNameE: THE BINDING SITE BINDAZYMETM Human Anti dsDNA Enzyme Immunoassay kit
ingredientsDesc:
Instruction Leaflet: Giving full assay details.
QC Certificate: Indicating the expected performance of the batch.
dsDNA Coated Wells: 12 breakapart 8 well strips coated with calf thymus dsDNA antigen. Each plate is packaged in a resealable foil bag containing two desiccant pouches.
Type III Sample Diluent: 2 bottles containing 50 ml of buffer for sample diluent.
Type III Wash Buffer (20x Concentrate): 1 bottle containing 50 ml of a 20-fold concentrated buffer for washing the wells.
dsDNA Calibrators: 5 bottles each containing 1.2 ml of diluted human serum, with the following concentrations of anti-dsDNA autoantibody: 1000, 333, 111, 37, 12.3 IU/ml.
dsDNA Positive Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2 ml of diluted human serum. The expected value is given on the QC certificate.
dsDNA Negative Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2 ml of diluted human serum. The expected value is given on the QC certificate.
dsDNA Single Strandard Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2 ml of diluted human serum. The expected value is gi
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 測量人類血清中特異性G型免疫球蛋白自體抗體對抗雙股去氧核醣核酸，有助於系統性紅斑性狼瘡(SLE)的診斷。
